title: The 12 Zodiac Signs as Dog Breeds: Which Is Your Perfect Match?

steps.content: Bold, energetic, and daring, Aries is always on the move and ready to go. [1] X Research source With their playful and lively personalities, you’ll be hard-pressed to find a lively Lab that isn’t full of intense energy, power, and stamina. [2] X Research source Like Aries a Lab finds its purpose through action, and both love to think about the new opportunities that each day can bring. Element: Fire Ruling planet: Mars Most compatible owner signs: Aries , Leo , Sagittarius Least compatible owner signs Cancer , Virgo , Scorpio , Capricorn

Stubborn, determined, and sensual, Taurus is known for embracing the physical pleasures of life that are linked to their five senses. [3] X Research source Beagles are well known for their amazing sense of smell, as well as their drive to follow a scent wherever it goes. [4] X Research source The independent and headstrong Beagle can also relate with the similarly stubborn Taurus, as both are hard to nudge when they have their mind (or nose) set on something. Element: Earth Ruling planet: Venus Most compatible owner signs: Taurus , Virgo , Capricorn Least compatible owner signs: Leo , Libra , Sagittarius , Aquarius

Flexible, adaptable, and social, Gemini always needs to keep their intelligent mind busy with something. [5] X Research source Dachshunds can relate—despite their small stature, these wiener dogs require a lot of mental stimulation to live happy lives. [6] X Research source A Gemini and a Dachshund also know a thing or two about fitting in with the people around them and making a good first impression. Element: Air Ruling planet: Mercury Most compatible owner signs: Gemini , Libra , Aquarius Least compatible owner signs: Virgo , Scorpio , Capricorn , Pisces

Protective, nurturing, and caring, Cancer is a sensitive soul that loves to spend time at home. [7] X Research source Rottweilers have similar temperaments—they’re incredibly loyal and caring pets who want to do nothing more than keep their pack out of harm’s way. [8] X Research source While Cancer and Rottweiler may not be the most bubbly and social ones of the bunch, they’re loyal and devoted to those they love. Element: Water Ruling planet: The Moon Most compatible owner signs: Cancer , Scorpio , Pisces Least compatible owner signs: Aries, Libra , Sagittarius , Aquarius

Regal, determined, and loyal, Leo is a bright ray of sunlight that isn’t afraid to take the lead. [9] X Research source This fits perfectly with the immensely popular French Bulldog. Frenchies have no trouble developing a loyal bond with their owners and aren’t afraid to take center stage and claim someone’s lap as their napping spot. [10] X Research source When push comes to shove, a Leo and French Bulldog alike never fail to grab your attention. Element: Fire Ruling planet: The Sun Most compatible owner signs: Aries, Leo , Sagittarius Least compatible owner signs: Taurus, Scorpio, Capricorn , Pisces

Responsible, practical, and curious, Virgo is always plugged into the world around them. [11] X Research source Australian Shepherds are kindred spirits in that sense, as they have a distinct tendency to solve problems on their own. [12] X Research source This Aussie hound is also great at focusing and learning new things—traits that make it a perfect fit for the intelligent and thoughtful Virgo. Element: Earth Ruling planet: Mercury Most compatible owner signs: Taurus, Virgo , Capricorn, Least compatible owner signs: Aries, Gemini, Sagittarius , Aquarius

Harmonious, social, and peaceful, Libras are known as mediating souls who don’t like to rock the boat. [13] X Research source The English Bulldog (also known just as the “Bulldog”) can relate. As far as dog breeds go, they aren’t very temperamental; in fact, they can put up with just about anything (as long as it doesn’t involve their food bowl). [14] X Research source But hey—Libras are known to love the finer things in life, too, like a delicious meal. Element: Air Ruling planet: Venus Most compatible owner signs: Gemini, Libra , Aquarius Least compatible owner signs: Taurus, Cancer, Capricorn, Pisces

Determined, persevering, and a little mysterious, Scorpio is famous for their sense of passion and commitment. [15] X Research source Shiba Inus carry a similar reputation—they’re known to be free-spirited and determined pups that are famously independent and unpredictable. [16] X Trustworthy Source American Kennel Club The American Kennel Club (AKC) is a purebred dog pedigree registry in the United States. The AKC advocates for the responsible ownership of dogs and promotes purebred dog events, such as the Westminster Dog Show. Go to source Don’t be discouraged, though. At heart, Scorpios and Shiba Inus are both loving and devoted pals! Element: Water Ruling planet: Pluto Most compatible owner signs: Cancer, Scorpio , Pisces Least compatible owner signs: Aries, Gemini, Leo, Aquarius

Adventurous, friendly, and laid-back, Sagittarius has earned its reputation as the explorer of the zodiac. [17] X Research source Poodles have a lot in common with this free-spirited star sign, as they also approach life from a cheerful and fun-loving perspective. They also love to be on the go (just like Sagittarius) and appreciate the opportunity to go for a good romp around the block. [18] X Research source Element: Fire Ruling planet: Jupiter Most compatible owner signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Least compatible owner signs: Taurus, Cancer, Virgo, Pisces

Hard-working, practical, and grounded, Capricorns are known for their strong work ethic and loyal circle of friends. [19] X Research source Enter the German Shepherd dog: they’re great at learning new things and will go above and beyond to achieve their goals—just like a Capricorn! They’re also intensely dedicated to their family and will go the extra mile to keep them safe and cared for. [20] X Research source Element: Earth Ruling planet: Saturn Most compatible owner signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Least compatible owner signs: Aries, Gemini, Leo, Libra

Inventive, intelligent, and independent, Aquarius is known for being their person and breaking free of the status quo. [21] X Research source The Pembroke Welsh Corgi is the same way. Despite looking like a lap dog, the Corgi is an energetic and smart pal who’s always on the move. [22] X Research source Both Aquarius and the Corgi are great at rebelling against other people’s expectations and being their unique selves. Element: Air Ruling planet: Uranus Most compatible owner signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Least compatible owner signs: Taurus, Cancer, Virgo, Scorpio

Caring, empathetic, and expressive, Pisces are sensitive spirits who have no trouble relating with others. [23] X Research source Golden Retrievers match this energy perfectly and have more than earned their spot as a popular family pet. [24] X Research source These sweet, gentle, and loving pups are devoted pals who love to support those they care about—just like Pisces! Element: Water Ruling planet: Neptune Most compatible owner signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Least compatible owner signs: Gemini, Leo, Libra, Sagittarius
